lead_paragraph: When Leicester City faced Sunderland on the opening day of the season, even their most optimistic fans were expecting another testing struggle to avoid relegation.

headline.print_headline: Leicester Within Four Wins of Fairytale
headline.main: Leicester Within Four Wins of Fairytale
